title: Captain Bluebottle's Amazing Treasure Hunt
description: Mr Bluebottle is bored. He used to be a brave sea captain, but now he's stuck on land, without any excitement in sight. He decides to return to sea for a life of tall ships, huge storms, mean pirates and golden treasure. Roger, the parrot, is keen, but Ben, his ten-year-old son would rather stay home with his X-Box. He thinks his father is just dead boring...
author: Margaret Germon
